website_summaries.verdict: The BlackBerry Mini Stereo Speaker has an interesting clippable shape, but at a price of $99.99, other portable audio devices are a better deal.
pros: The BlackBerry Mini Stereo Speaker is small and easy to carry, and has a unique clippable design
cons: The speaker is expensive and its sound lacks bass, richness, and clarity

customer_reviews.title: Great for running and staying aware of your surroundings
customer_reviews.text: Use this for running. Really light and stays clipped to me. This way I can listen to music but still be aware of whats going on around me, like cars and other people. Sound quality and volume are descent.
customer_reviews.author: Bear

customer_reviews.title: Decent sound for 9$ bucks
customer_reviews.text: Ok let me give you a humble advice so you decide if buy or not. Keep in mind it's a 9$ speaker but it's pretty good for the price, dont expect q JBL quality sound but it still decent. Battery it lasted 8 hours. But if you will have for walking or running or bike, will be nice. BUT if you work in a really loud environment like a manufacturer dont buy it. It's not gonna work.
customer_reviews.author: Astrid G.

customer_reviews.title: Good Canadian Product
customer_reviews.text: I am a Canadian who really likes Blackberry. I find it hard to believe that I have to order from the US amazon site to get this crazy cheap price on such an excellent product. I have tested it with my iPhone and it works flawlessly. Sound is adequate for a bluetooth speaker but of course it won't be Bose quality and shouldn't be just based on size alone. The sound will surprise you tho .... much louder and crisper than what I expected. As I stated earlier a Canadian shouldn't have to order a Canadian made device from the US. I hope you find this helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Dave B

customer_reviews.title: Great for work
customer_reviews.text: This speaker works perfectly. I work at a hospital and no longer have to worry about walking away from my speaker and having someone hear my inappropriate music, it just goes where I go now.
customer_reviews.author: c  cookie

customer_reviews.title: Defective times 2
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 2. Defective straight out of the box. Very disappointing. My wife threw away shipping boxes. Small financial loss. But the product is crap. Waste of time and money. You would think quality control would test before shipment. How does 2 of the same device arrive defective? You made me give one star just to post my comment. This device deserves none.
customer_reviews.author: Wonderwattspot

customer_reviews.title: Was good while it lasted.
customer_reviews.text: This was great. I enjoyed every minute of it until the battery quite charging. The battery life itself was good about 16 hrs between charges. This product lasted about 1 month.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael C.

customer_reviews.title: It's ok, but not worth the trouble.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time i buy this product. The first one had amazing sound quality blasting from the little speaker an i loved it! But the speaker went out after about a week or two. So i returned it and bought it again but the quality of sound and volume is not the same as the first one i bought. I don't understand why that is. Its a good product if the sound quality would last longer
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I need a new one.
customer_reviews.text: Charge very good, the only button which is work is the turn on and off, after that, no button working..... basically item not working at all.
customer_reviews.author: MARHY J. F.

customer_reviews.title: It goes on...and on... and on...
customer_reviews.text: For the cost this speaker is amazing. Not the best sound quality but you don’t buys these speakers if you’re an audiophile. I was amazed when this speaker lasted over ten hours on a single charge.
customer_reviews.author: David D.

customer_reviews.title: Non-functioning items sent! 0 Stars!
customer_reviews.text: I received my 1st speaker. Wouldn't charge, wouldn't power on. No lights nothing. This was refunded and re-ordered. Same thing with the second one. Don't waste your time. I wish I could give 0 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy D.

customer_reviews.title: Great for its price, but, interferes with my WIFI network
customer_reviews.text: Works fine. But, creates interference with my wifi network which drastically slows down to 1/10th of the speed. Bluetooth calls over my android phone work great though. I ordered this primary to use it a as bluetooth transmitter by connecting to my wired headphone or stereo speakers. Due to all the interference with WIFI, found an alternate use of converting my car stereo into bluetooth enabled system. Had there been no interference, issues would have ordered another couple of these.
customer_reviews.author: nirmala

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I love blackberry products, as always easy to use and dependable. Remember it’s not an audiophiles dream, awesome speaker phone
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Towne

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Value!
customer_reviews.text: Okay do not expect great sound. But for conference calls and a speaker in general this is really good. For the price and the brand is a good portable speaker to have.
customer_reviews.author: Gabie

customer_reviews.title: Two thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: I love it. The sound is great. The size is just right so it fits in pocket, purse easily.
customer_reviews.author: Charlene O

customer_reviews.title: not bad for $10 bucks
customer_reviews.text: pretty nifty, gets loud enough for on road use. okay battery life and pretty decent signal/ strength and ease of pairing. the clamping/holding thing works pretty well on thin bag strap - don't expect it to work on thicker nylon/canvas/leather or padded straps.
customer_reviews.author: juice

customer_reviews.title: Too quiet.
customer_reviews.text: Works but is extremely quiet even at max volume. As a novelty item its ok but not to use as a visor clip in the car or on a table. Unless there is absolutely no ambient noise. I just wish it lived up to Blackberries reputation.
customer_reviews.author: brad

customer_reviews.title: Just arrived and doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: I received this today looks nice but doesn't work. When I disconnect from charging cable it dies. No lights, no sound, nothing... disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Pena

customer_reviews.title: Really cool for skiing and using as a speakerphone hooked up ...
customer_reviews.text: Really cool for skiing and using as a speakerphone hooked up to a laptop. Excellent sound quality for the money. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: DjeAMZN

customer_reviews.title: Great little speaker! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome sound for the size! It's not gonna fill a room but if you are looking for something to clip into a shirt or belt then you can beat this little speaker. I work outside and listen to podcast on it and it does a great job, better than having headphones in and having to take them off and on.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Denham

customer_reviews.title: I love this speaker ~ this is my third one
customer_reviews.text: I love this speaker ~ this is my third one. One was my fault as I dropped it into the bathtub. One the pause button stuck paused and it would not play.
customer_reviews.author: StuburnlyMe

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for my needs. I like to watch netflix on my Blackberry Passport. I use the mini bluetooth at my bedside. Great deal for the price. The sound is perfect for my use and I would use something different if I wanted greater sound. My brother has an Iphone and wished it worked with his phone
customer_reviews.author: Raf

customer_reviews.title: Great while it lasted! (Less than two months)
customer_reviews.text: This thing was great while it lasted. It just stopped accepting charge all of a sudden. I used it less than two months.
customer_reviews.author: KY Mailman

customer_reviews.title: Great find
customer_reviews.text: Works better than I thought it would. Easy to connect to. Small and sturdy. Surprisingly loud. I would most certainly recommend this speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Willis

customer_reviews.title: It's not a boom box but perfect for lying in bed
customer_reviews.text: I really bought this as a speaker to video streams from my S3. It's not a boom box but perfect for lying in bed. The bonus too is a great speaker phone for car. All for$20!
customer_reviews.author: F. P. Stefano

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good sound quality. Small and compact. Excellent product selling for a ridiculously discounted, low price.
customer_reviews.author: GK

customer_reviews.title: POC
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work, have another BT speaker and it works perfectly, this one just stops and plays every 2 seconds like the old BT audio headsets...
customer_reviews.author: Motty H

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: It's a high cp value product. And it works very well. I will recommend that you can buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It sucked
customer_reviews.text: Just wasn't what I had expected. Had no volume and battery didn't last long.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Rogers.

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected, but sound quality is ok ...
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected, but sound quality is ok. Aux jack is for output only. Sound quality is the only reason I gave it two stars.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Chimpo

customer_reviews.title: do not waste money this item
customer_reviews.text: Spesaer only worked one day.do not waste money this item.
customer_reviews.author: kevin pulley

customer_reviews.title: I would buy a million of these
customer_reviews.text: I bought it 6 months ago and I still love it. The battery life is amazing. The sound is great. And the fact that you can hang it on your clothing and don't have to worry about it falling off is fantastic
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Braswell

customer_reviews.title: Works great long battery
customer_reviews.text: Sounds good. Use it at work and clip it on my shirt by my ear, work great for a little personal speaker. The battery life is really good.
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just enough room to clip it to a sun visor.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Quality was good as expected. i recomend this product as value for money.
customer_reviews.author: R.Gill

customer_reviews.title: The best bluetooth ever!
customer_reviews.text: This item work the best out of all that I have it's last longer than the 8hr work day.
customer_reviews.author: John C.

customer_reviews.title: good for voice
customer_reviews.text: Like this and wish I had found it earlier. Not great for music but good for voice and pairs with my BB without a hitch as would be expected. I attach it to the chest strap of my backpack and listen to podcast during my bicycle commute.
customer_reviews.author: InnerSunset

customer_reviews.text: Got two, one works well and the other does not.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The sound is ok but the Bluetooth keeps dropping. Maybe it's not compatible with my Amazon fire phone.
customer_reviews.author: Gremlin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome BB product.. one of the few.. lol
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, works as it should and is plenty loud.. Was real cheap too!
customer_reviews.author: C. Reid

customer_reviews.title: Horrible product!
customer_reviews.text: The product worked perfectly until 3 months after my purchase. The sound went out.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Parker

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and Convenient!
customer_reviews.text: This works great with my Samsung tab. Sound is decent for what it is, but I find it wildly ironic that this will not connect to my Passport, Classic, or even my old 8320. It doesn't connect with my Macbook Pro either. All these things connect to each other but only the Tab connects with the speaker. Alas. UPDATE: I was finally able to connect my other devices to this little speaker. I don't know why it wouldn't connect initially, but after a month or two, I tried again and it worked. Maybe dropping it a bunch on hard surfaces was the trick. Go figure.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Cuts in and out alot
customer_reviews.text: Answer button broke or stopped working within the 2 weeks I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Francisco Aldaco

customer_reviews.title: my number two
customer_reviews.text: Love this speaker so much. I re ordered it. What can I say I'm a crackberry addict! Love this thing!!!
customer_reviews.author: b.d. moore

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great speakers there great for the price but my mute button is broken on one of them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good when working
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoyed this speaker while it worked, but the speaker became distorted after less than a month of use. I emailed the seller and he informed me of the 1 year manufacturer's warranty. I will be contacting them for a replacement. Otherwise, I really was enjoying the speaker and it's portability.
customer_reviews.author: vjee

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This product is very AWFUL I used this item twice and the speaker went out ....NO STARS
customer_reviews.author: Brown Suga

customer_reviews.title: As a speaker it works wonderful. But the built in microphone does not
customer_reviews.text: As a speaker it works wonderful. But the built in microphone does not. It is almost impossible to have a phone conversation, the person on the oter end of the phone cannot hear
customer_reviews.author: Sal DAgostino

customer_reviews.title: or make noise like a speaker should
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived and would not work. The LED light never turned on, the device would not work plugged in and would not produce any noise. I tested the device with another charger and it still would not power on, pair, or make noise like a speaker should. Bummed, but not too surprised.
customer_reviews.author: Bre

customer_reviews.title: Let down
customer_reviews.text: I have read all the reviews and they sounded very positive. What I found is the sound has no bass. It does not get loud and the only thing nice about it is the clip on design. It was not worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Daren Peck

customer_reviews.title: I have a feeling that you can ONLY use this ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a feeling that you can ONLY use this speaker with Blackberry brand devices. It refused to sync with any of my android or windows bluetooth devices. I don't know if that makes the difference or it just was a glitch in the product
customer_reviews.author: puzzled

customer_reviews.title: Best cycling speaker - Clips to Jersey
customer_reviews.text: It's been said before, but this speaker is amazing for the price. After doing much research on cycling bluetooth speakers, I found this one. Happily I discovered that it will clip onto my jersey securely so I don't have to affix it to my handlebars or backpack. It will not win any awards for sound quality, but it is loud enough and feels well made in hand. Blackberry must've lost money on this thing, but we are the beneficiaries.
customer_reviews.author: JohnMF

customer_reviews.title: Clipped it on my welding helmet.
customer_reviews.text: I envisioned clipping this device on my welding helmet to listen to music I like while I work. It is lite enough to not add significant weight to my welding helmet. The sound quality is passable and loud enough in my noisy work environment. I even had to lower the volume because the music was well contained inside my welding helmet. I can't speak to its longevity in the environment I chose to use it but for the price I can risk it. Only had the chance to use it for one day so far. Great product for the price I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Javi

customer_reviews.title: Was a Very nice 🔊
customer_reviews.text: I bought this speaker on impulse because it was so cheap.I'm listening to music every day on my phone so I thought why not. Paired up to my phone and just plays.I can carry it around to different rooms and doesn't cut out,unlike my expensive old speaker.It will replay and skip ahead and even act as a hands free phone speaker.What more could you ask.I am quite impressed so far. Updated May 2018 died today and will not recharge or reconnect to my phone
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Speaker Phone/Stereo Speaker
customer_reviews.text: As a speaker phone and stereo speaker for music, it works quite well. The only reason I don't give it a 5 star is that it's designed to Only be attached to a strap or placed on a flat surface. In other words, I can't attach it to my car's visor and it's cumbersome to attach to the seatbelt. Non the less, I have rigged it so I can attach it to my visor using an eleastic strap and I am very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Henry635

customer_reviews.title: Volume is low
customer_reviews.text: Sound volume is even less than my iPad Air. I had hoped to use this to amplify the volume on my iPad but it does not do that. This is handy for working in the yard. You can leave your iPad on the patio and listen to it as you move around in the yard.
customer_reviews.author: Darryl L. Huffman

customer_reviews.title: Sounds very good for its size and price
customer_reviews.text: Sounds very good for its size and price. I’d give it 5 stars if it were easier to snap in my t-shirt’s collar.
customer_reviews.author: Christozoid

customer_reviews.title: I'm able to lower the volume just enough for my enjoyment not everyone else
customer_reviews.text: I walk in a quiet community so I didn't want a loud speaker. I'm able to lower the volume just enough for my enjoyment not everyone else. Plus, it connects to my apple watch series 3.
customer_reviews.author: Sono_Girl

customer_reviews.title: Great $11 speaker
customer_reviews.text: For what it is, 5 stars. As a BlackBerry fan, I'm surprised that it took me this long to buy this little speaker. For $100, it's outclassed. For $11, you can't beat the thing. This seems to be the way of BlackBerry. Their MSRPs are a bit high for what the competition has. Yet, for midrange pricing, or in this case, overstock, it's solid. It won't thump your bass, but it's solid for an office speaker.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Good cost benefit, especially for Blackberry devices
customer_reviews.text: Good price for the quality of the product. However, it is not very sturdy and sound could be louder. The design idea is interesting, but in real life it isn't that useful since you cannot open much the speakers. Being able to use it as a hands free device is a plus. Good integration with BB10 phones; regular Bluetooth device with the PlayBook. I haven't tried with Android or Iphones.
customer_reviews.author: sejogue

customer_reviews.title: died after 3 weeks
customer_reviews.text: When I first got it, it kept an amazing charged. Charged it once and lasted 2-3 days. Well...that lasted about 3 weeks. I can charge it now and it won't even hold a charge to connect to my phone. Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.author: April McCall

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad deal
customer_reviews.text: I think that it should be more detailed about the power on and off. You have to look carefully at the instructions for the details. But not to bad for the money. I like it
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Great for podcast listening.
customer_reviews.text: Good for what it is - I wasn't expecting great bass and it doesn't deliver it. It does, however, sound fine for my main purpose - podcast listening. It clips onto my jean pockets well - but I do wish the hinge opened up just a little more (it warns not to open more than 5mm) - which makes it hard to put onto some places that I would like it to slide onto. I like that I can use it as a bluetooth receiver for a larger stereo.
customer_reviews.author: Verjeep

customer_reviews.title: Good idea w the beltclip design
customer_reviews.text: Good idea w the beltclip design, but,,,,,,, Volume not loud at all. Only if you are at home alone and no background noise. Function are so simple that they are lacking the "function"! Also had problem pairing w my android phone........ Going to return it
customer_reviews.author: Dexter

customer_reviews.title: hands free
customer_reviews.text: clip to suspenders or jacket, leaves hands free to do whatever
customer_reviews.author: toasted

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is perfect! So I bought this to take to the lake this summer and was hoping it would be loud enough, well let me to you it's way loud and so clear. I'm very impressed with it and very glad I ordered it
customer_reviews.author: Clark_Elite

customer_reviews.title: Crackling
customer_reviews.text: Shortly after I bought it, it started crackling while the music played
customer_reviews.author: Jessica S

customer_reviews.title: its ok for the price
customer_reviews.text: not the best of sound but good enough for the size
customer_reviews.author: Francis Aiwohi

customer_reviews.title: Great small bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for when exercising. Sound is great!!
customer_reviews.author: Mark J

customer_reviews.title: Works fine at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: The audio is a little on the boxy tinny side, but for its size and price it is loud and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Gary D. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Decent little speaker
customer_reviews.text: Cheap but it works decent. Not real loud but loud enough.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Clip on, take off!
customer_reviews.text: Much handier than the Boom portable speakers. Clips on to the backpack while biking and can connect with my phone from two rooms over.
customer_reviews.author: Goldieg 26

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker
customer_reviews.text: Great and small speaker, but it would be great if it comes with more bass.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive speaker with decent sound
customer_reviews.text: I clip this to my seat belt so I can listen to audiobooks and music from my mobile device during long trips since I have an older model car and cannot play content from my phone through the car speaker without using an Aux cable.
customer_reviews.author: MoondropDawn

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: purchased 2, both units quit working the exactly same way( the high volume quit working
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Probably the best device for the money I've ever bought!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Use it for walking when I don't want earbuds planted in my ears. Obviously it's not exactly hi-fidelity, but much louder and clearer than the built-in iPhone speakers.
customer_reviews.author: LQA

customer_reviews.title: it is the best trouble free high quality system I have found
customer_reviews.text: I use in car as hands free and attached to to several speaker systems as blue tooth connection with LG G2. it is the best trouble free high quality system I have found.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Not super, but great!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing, it allows me to use my favorite headphone. I use this to watch TV so I don't bother anyone with the TV speaker sound, or I can use the built in speaker so I don't have to crank up the TV speaker.
customer_reviews.author: kampredski

customer_reviews.title: Small item and excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: I wish they had in in black. Maybe they do did not see it but in any case the sound quality is exceptional and very clear whether listening to music or holding a conversation.
customer_reviews.author: whynothim

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Good sound in a small package at a nice price. Louder than my phone so great for working out or listening in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie V.

customer_reviews.title: This is like a prototype for BlackBerry that will get better over time.
customer_reviews.text: I think this little speaker is off the hook. I was looking for a headphone Bluetooth adapter and came cross this in my search. I got no complaints! It's more than what I was looking for! It sounds good enough for it to be a small speaker and in-line headphone adapter.
customer_reviews.author: t taylor

customer_reviews.title: Clipped to a running vest and it worked great.
customer_reviews.text: clear sound for such a small speaker. I can have it upstairs when my phone is downstairs. Clipped to a running vest and it worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sound but doesn't work with the Galaxy S6
customer_reviews.text: Galaxy S3 to use as an MP3 player my gosh the sound is amazing it would not connect to my Galaxy S6 I don't know why
customer_reviews.author: Audible 1

customer_reviews.title: The sound quality wasn't to good. It sound like it had static
customer_reviews.text: It wasn't that loud. The sound quality wasn't to good. It sound like it had static. I pushed the volume button into the device trying to turn it up.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly H.

customer_reviews.title: Long Battery Life
customer_reviews.text: Great concept. A Bluetooth speaker that slips on your seat belt. Allows for better volume control and less noise when you're speaking. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Stanley Joe Wynman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing speaker! I put it on my seat belt and it has great clairity and mic volume.
customer_reviews.author: Canadian Guy

customer_reviews.title: I use this speaker all the time my stereo is ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this speaker all the time my stereo is broken in my car. Now I just play music from my phone using this speaker
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Bertram

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for personal use
customer_reviews.text: Very sweet little speaker... works on android phone or iPad. Self-contained rechargeable battery, simple connection.
customer_reviews.author: lucy

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Does the job. It's very cute. Durable. Just enough for the bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: M. Lucas

customer_reviews.title: The sound isn't too bad. The Bluetooth has also worked very good for ...
customer_reviews.text: Clip is a bit frail feeling. Doesn't open up very far at all. The sound isn't too bad. The Bluetooth has also worked very good for me so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Blackberry is the best.
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Easy instructions. Powerful speakers. I use it with my Blackberry Z30.
customer_reviews.author: S. Gillingham

customer_reviews.title: Big sound from small Package
customer_reviews.text: This is better than I thought it would be. Excellent for the size and money.
customer_reviews.author: Gary H

customer_reviews.title: not good, not bad
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is OK, not good, not bad, just ok. But it's easy to use and worth the money spent :)
customer_reviews.author: Cam

customer_reviews.title: it arrived perfectly wrapped in the box, used it ...
customer_reviews.text: it arrived perfectly wrapped in the box, used it about 10 times just to walk to work (10min walk) then one day i try n connect n the green light stood on and it doesnt turn off...basiclly doesnt work
customer_reviews.author: A Dones

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great portable bluetooth speaker that works with any bluetooth phone i've tried. can't beat it for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Roy Lee Osborne

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great device and very compact and with a great battery life
customer_reviews.author: Anil K. Aluri MD

product_meta.title: BlackBerry ACC-52983-001 Mini Bluetooth Speaker - Retail Packaging - White
product_meta.description: Product Packaging:Standard PackagingA uniquely wearable and portable Bluetooth speaker for wireless music playing and enhanced hands-free calling.
feature_bullets: Light clip-on design allows you to wear it on a shoulder strap, place it on a table, desk or bedside table -the options are endless!
Noise reduction and echo cancellation technology, ensures your voice is heard loud and clear.
Play music or take calls from any Bluetooth enabled portable media player, smartphone or tablet. Compatible with all devices supporting Bluetooth HFP 1.5, A2DP, and AVRCP.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars247 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
